characters.story: Along the border road, your nose catches the scent, singing "Bian!" cheerfully as you cross the edge!
Deep water sings "Shen!" cheerfully as you dive down into the profound darkness!
A spy with hands reaching into the cave commands "Tan!" sharply, exploring every hidden corner!
The hill rises like a hobbit-home, singing "Chyo!" cheerfully round and grassy!
Troops with axes march cheerfully singing "Bing!" as soldiers in formation!
